Name: The Ambitious Millennial Professional
Reason: If it integrated with existing public transportation options and demonstrated a significant time-saving benefit, she would be more likely to use it.

Name: The Suburban IT Specialist
Reason: He would buy it if the system had robust cybersecurity measures and clear data privacy policies.

Name: The Independent Remote Worker
